I used RemoveWAT 2.2.5 and my Windows was fine, after installing SP1, it gave the non-genuine crap.

I tried to use RemoveWAT 2.2.5 and is just does not open, downloaded 2.2.6 and it does not open either. I double-click the file and nothing happens.

Can anyone help me out?

Ok, I got it to work.

If anyone else has the same issue I did. You need to be fast with RemoveWAT. So here's how I did it.

I placed removeWAT.exe on my desktop. Restarted my PC, logged in. Got 2 messages from windows regarding Activation. Went for Ask me later and OK.
As soon as I saw the icon for RemoveWAT on the desktop I ran it, hit RestoreWAT, OK. Once it was done, reboot.
Repeat the process for RemoveWAT, and you're done.

I did quite some restarts... it only seemed to load before all my services were up. If I took a couple more seconds I couldn't have done it.

Hope this helps someone.

I restored WAT using the same RemoveWAT 2.2.5.

Rebooted.
The message to activate gone.

Worked on Windows 7 Ultimate 32 bits.

error133, this happens to me occasionally also but only when I restart my computer and after several hours pass. If you rt-click My Computer, go to Properties, there will be no info about activation or registration at all, and the message in the bottom corner will disappear. Just check the properties every time you reboot (2 clicks, no big deal) and it won't come up. If it comes up, this will make it disappear.
It works but you are stuck with the "This copy of windows is not genuine" on the bottom right of the desktop.
